titleStmt.title: An epistle of farewell to the people of God called Quakers where ever scattered or gathered in England, Ireland, Scotland, Holland, Germany, or in any other parts of Europe.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,
